newsitem.title: USA: Spelling television and films boosted Q4.
newsitem.headline: Spelling television and films boosted Q4.

text.p: Spelling Entertainment Group Inc said its focus towards strengthening its television and feature film businesses boosted results from those units in the fourth quarter of 1996 and should continue into 1997.
Fourth quarter revenues from television programming and distribution units climbed 47 percent to $122.2 million from $82.9 million in the fourth quarter of 1995.

Included in Spelling Entertainment's results for the full year 1996 is a charge of $255.2 million associated with the company's previously announced plans to divest its majority interest in Virgin Interactive Entertainment (VIE).
